data.trans_hint: Những bông hoa trong vườn rất đẹp.
data.en_hint: The flowers in the garden are beautiful.
data.content_game_1: The flowers in the garden are beautiful.
data.answer_en_hint: The flowers in the garden are beautiful.

data.trans_hint: Anh ấy đang trồng cây trong vườn
data.en_hint: He is planting trees in the garden.
data.content_game_1: He is planting trees in the garden.
data.answer_en_hint: He is planting trees in the garden.

data.trans: Ống nước có vòi (để tưới cây)
data.trans_hint: Ông ấy tưới nước cho những cây nhỏ trong vườn bằng ống có vòi.
data.en_hint: He waters the little trees in the garden by a hose.
data.content_game_1: He waters the little trees in the garden by a hose.
data.answer_en_hint: He waters the little trees in the garden by a hose.

data.trans_hint: Anh ấy thường cắt thảm cỏ vào cuối tuần.
data.en_hint: He often mows the lawn at the weekend.
data.content_game_1: He often mows the lawn at the weekend.
data.answer_en_hint: He often mows the lawn at the weekend.

data.trans_hint: Vào mùa hè, chúng tôi thường ăn bữa ăn sáng trong sân sau nhà.
data.en_hint: In the summer we often have breakfast out in the patio.
data.content_game_1: In the summer we often have breakfast out in the patio.
data.answer_en_hint: In the summer we often have breakfast out in the patio.

data.trans_hint: Họ có rất nhiều đồ nội thất cổ trong phòng khách.
data.en_hint: They have a lot of antique furniture in the living room.
data.content_game_1: They have a lot of antique furniture in the living room.
data.answer_en_hint: They have a lot of antique furniture in the living room.

data.trans_hint: Anh ấy dùng một cái xẻng để trồng một cây non.
data.en_hint: He uses a shovel to plant a small tree.
data.content_game_1: He uses a shovel to plant a small tree.
data.answer_en_hint: He uses a shovel to plant a small tree.

data.trans_hint: Anh ấy tưới nước cho những cây hoa bằng bình tưới nước.
data.en_hint: He waters the flowers by a sprinkler.
data.content_game_1: He waters the flowers by a sprinkler.
data.answer_en_hint: He waters the flowers by a sprinkler.

data.trans_hint: Có rất nhiều cây lớn trên đường Phan Đình Phùng.
data.en_hint: There are many big trees on Phan Dinh Phung Street.
data.content_game_1: There are many big trees on Phan Dinh Phung Street.
data.answer_en_hint: There are many big trees on Phan Dinh Phung Street.

data.trans_hint: Tôi mua chậu cây này cho anh trai tôi như một món quà lưu niệm.
data.en_hint: I bought this flowerpot for my brother as a souvenir.
data.content_game_1: I bought this flowerpot for my brother as a souvenir.
